com.github.dankinsoid.multicursor VimMulticursor dankinsoid
com.intellij.modules.platform IdeaVIM A powerful extension for IdeaVim that adds multiple cursors and selections through Vim commands. Use `mc` prefix to create multiple cursors or `ms` prefix to create multiple selections, followed by any supported Vim command. All commands work within selected text if there's an active selection.
Supported Commands: • Navigation - Word: w/W (next words), b/B (prev words), e/E (words ends) - Character: f/F (find chars), t/T (till chars) - Pattern: / (regex search)
• Around text objects with cursors - mcaw: Around word - mca + bracket: Around bracket, like `mca(`/`mcab`, `mca{`/`mcaB`, `mca"`, etc - mci + bracket: Inside bracket, like `mci(`/`mcib`, `mci{`/`mciB`, `mci"`, etc - Any bracket: mcaa/mcia (smart matching)
• Cursor Management - mcc: Add/remove cursor at position - mcr: Convert virtual cursors to real - mcd: Clear all cursors
Full guide: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
